p:
Lundin et al. screened a library of 16 671 diverse compounds and found a small molecule inhibitor, K22 ( 2), which was able to inhibit HCoV-229E with an IC 50 value of 0.7 μM and CC 50 value of 110 μM. Studies for mechanism showed that K22 targeted a very early step in the HCoV-229E life cycle and may interact with viral particles, thus inactivating their binding.
58
